T = int(input())
for _ in range(T):
    n = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    s = l[:]
    s.sort()
    down = 0
    for i in range(1, n):
        if l[i] < l[i - 1]:
            (l[i], l[i - 1]) = (l[i - 1], l[i])
            break
    print('YES' if l == s else 'NO')
